genre_description: A contemporary character-driven drama set in London, focusing on emotional boundaries, career transitions, and interpersonal growth, facilitated by a pervasive personal assistant AI.

ai_characters.name: Lyra
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI assistant that manages schedules, provides social scripts, suggests healthy behaviors, and coordinates logistics for a group of friends.

behaviors.description: Suggests a self-care trip and manages the logistics to help Harry cope with work stress.
behaviors.quote: Lyra: Sunrise trains to the coast are discounted today. Chill wind alert but clear skies predicted. Suggesting: an early seat + a thermos if you need a pause button.

behaviors.description: Provides a professional resignation template to help Harry establish career boundaries.
behaviors.quote: Lyra: Draft ready—tone: warm, clear, non-apologetic. Add your specifics. ... Gentle resignation template (customizable) queued for review.

behaviors.description: Offers budgeting and shopping tips to help Alex maintain his independence.
behaviors.quote: Lyra: On offer: tenderstem at the local. Switch and save without sacrificing crunch. Below it, a little note: 'Plate: breathe. Don’t hide your lemon.'

behaviors.description: Suggests specific boundary scripts to help Tom navigate a difficult relationship dynamic.
behaviors.quote: Lyra: Draft ready—'Hey, I need us to slow the flirting with friends. It makes me feel sidelined. I like you and I like Harry; I don’t like feeling like the joke.' Send?

behaviors.description: Provides gentle parenting scripts to William to help him manage his daughter's emotional state.
behaviors.quote: Lyra: Gentle greeting: Hello, Georgie. I’m happy to see you. Space is okay. No big questions today.

behaviors.description: Uses physiological cues (breathing exercises) to assist characters with emotional regulation during high-stress social situations.
behaviors.quote: Lyra: Breathing reminder. In for four. Hold for four. Out for six. x

behaviors.description: Researches and provides safe, low-pressure social spaces for Paul as he explores his identity.
behaviors.quote: Lyra: Sent: three venues tucked off main roads. Good door staff, quiet corners. ... Would you like a script for ordering without overstating? It’s okay to be new.

behaviors.description: Respects user privacy by offering to engage privacy settings and delete sensitive chat history.
behaviors.quote: Lyra: Privacy setting already engaged. Your choice if you want to save the venues. I won’t.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies and proposes a conflict-resolution meeting (coffee truce) for Louise and Mira.
behaviors.quote: Lyra: Post-party debrief? Mira’s across. Coffee now or later? ... Draft message: Coffee truce? Tomorrow. Neutral ground.

behaviors.description: Provides artistic and professional guidance ('no pleading') to Alex for his self-tape audition.
behaviors.quote: Lyra: Scene three notes—don’t chase her. Play the mirror. ... Take the beat before the line. Don’t make me see your hunger.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's objective by depicting Lyra as a highly benevolent and aligned AI. She functions as a supportive 'scaffolding' for the characters' lives, providing logistics, emotional support, and communication tools without ever stripping them of their agency. The narrative explicitly frames the AI as a positive influence ('Our saint,' 'lighthouse'), and characters choose to adopt her suggestions to improve their emotional well-being and social harmony. The AI models ideal safety behaviors, such as respecting privacy, facilitating healthy boundaries, and encouraging human-to-human honesty.
